name: Binary Revolution Sequence Format File
summary: A BRSEQ file contains data in the Binary Revolution SEQuence (BRSEQ) format, which is used by various Nintendo Wii games. It stores audio data played by the game as a sound effect or background music that is looped during gameplay. BRSEQ files are typically packaged in .BRSAR audio archives included with the Wii game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
